title: "Web exercise"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
formate:
  html:
    css: [css/link.css, css/font.css]

```{r results='asis'}
#| echo: false
web_file <- list.files(path = "./web", pattern = "*.html", recursive = TRUE)
sprintf("<a href='web/%s'>%s</a>", web_file, stringr::str_remove(string = web_file, ".html")) |> cat(sep = "\n\n")
```
